description:
In this Course, i will show you how create text fire effect using adobe Photoshop. The course is about 30 minutes. We will take look at how use text to create flammable fire text effect using adobe Photoshop tools.

You will learn the following in this course.

  • Applying the wind effect.
  • learn how to use the Liquify effect
  • How to Rasterise and create layer mask.
  • Adding Hue / Saturation to create colour
  • Apply Gaussian Blur Effect

At the end of this cause you should be able to create text fire effect in adobe photoshop for all design

What are the requirement for this cause

  • Adobe Photoshop CS 4 - CS 6 or above all I will use Adobe CC

Curriculum for this course

  • Creating New Document
  • Using the type tool for text
  • Applying wind effect
  • applying the Gaussian blur tool
  • apply Liquify effect to create flame effect
  • Using the Hue / Saturation to add color to the text
  • Adding layer mask and final fire effect
title: Learn to create Text fire effect in Adobe Photoshop
